meaningMnemonic: A ____<kanji>pot</kanji> is any kind of food that's made inside the pot, put together, and cooked. This refers to a type of <vocabulary>pot</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>stew</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>hotpot</vocabulary>, and is attached onto the names of said pots, stews, and hotpots.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
